item.description:
"It ain't what you don't know that gets you into trouble. It's what you know for sure that just ain't so." -Mark Twain

Is mankind causing the planet to warm? How big is Al Gore's carbon footprint?
Is the scientific debate over? Just how warm will it get? How much will sea level rise? What are the consequences if we don't act? Come join us for a lively discussion of global warming. True believers, skeptics, environmentalists, and heretics welcome. Bring an open mind, and a warm coat!
item.name: Global Warming: Is it getting warm in here?
